attributes.review: I downloaded this app and as a fellow trump supporter I didn’t listen to the comments, wish I did. With someone with money and power this app should not have the ability to freeze and glitch out my phone. My phone now has a 15% battery decrease which I have to get physically fixed. Don’t get this app not worth it.
attributes.title: New app

attributes.review: I know all the Trump supporters will support Trump and will like this app but I’m not a trump supporter (I know I’m sorry) so I don’t really like this app. And really, ban TikTok!? Like come on. What about all the kids that have TikTok and it’s about to get banned and they aren’t allowed to have Instagram,Snapchat,Facebook, and Twitter. All I have to say is that please please please don’t delete TikTok for the U.S I’m begging you.
attributes.title: TRASH

attributes.review: Literally the single worst app I have ever used. It’s like nobody even tried. It seems they had our president design it and well you can tell it’s not his specially. Almost like how you can tell running an entire country just really isn’t in his skill set either. Actually his skill set is pretty empty. He’s good at eating McDonald’s though.
attributes.title: The president needs help

attributes.review: the download took a total of 6 hours. not even kidding. anyways, once it let me into the app i was bombarded with pop up ads then my phone shut down. so i deleted the app and 3 day’s later i was mailed multiple trump advertisements to my address from this app, when i didn’t even put my address in! THEY WILL STEAL YOUR INFO AND SPAM YOU IVE BEEN GETTING ROBO CALLS NONSTOP WHEN I DIDNT GIVE THEM MY PHONE NUMBER
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review:
Once I downloaded this app no other app worked, it took control over my whole phone, (crazy right, kinda like what Donald’s doing to the country!) forcing me to use this app as my only option of entertainment. If I were you, I’d never use this app. It will never be HUGE! 

-Sincerely
Your African American, Hispanic, Asian, European, and Native American Bi-Curious friend 😊
attributes.title: Don’t download this app

attributes.review: I got this app to support our amazing president Donald Trump. However, this app took a literal WEEK to download because of slow the app is. Also, this app started to cause glitching on my other apps on my iPhone. I deleted it right away, but the glitching is still continuing. DO NOT DOWNLOD THIS APP! It also gave me nightmares and sleep paralysis for over a month 😿😡😤
attributes.title: The worst app in my entire life

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to support my favorite president, but it immediately opened up a video call and President Trump himself called me a fat ugly loser😔 I know he has dementia, but I would really appreciate him being a little nicer to his supporters!! Also i’m writing this review from a new phone because mine exploded after I tried to delete the app!!!
attributes.title: Disappointed.

attributes.review: So I went to walk my dog at the park but then it’s started to rain. So we rushed home so I said to myself I need a jacket and I went to the store to go get one and then I was like why not get a non racist non Islamaphobic non homophobic and not a rapist president but I couldn’t because trump is so eat 💩so I came out the store with a jacket now I won’t get soak and wet when walking my dog Yh anyways 🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: No❤️🌸🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: This Cheeto/orange🍊🍊🍊🍊 is an insult to the oranges 🍊#orangelivesmatter,anyway the Cheeto you call your president🤢🤢🤮 is planning to ban tiktok so we will all rate his app 1 ⭐️ star so that it could get off the App Store 🏬 and if I could rate him zero stars I would. So spread the word we will not stop 🛑 until they leave us and tiktok alone #tiktokdancesmatter 😇also ✨⭐️trump 2020⭐️✨ in a ⚰️ coffin⭐️✨
attributes.title: The stupid orange,Cheeto,oompa loom papa you call president🤢🤮

attributes.review: when I downloaded this app it took forever and after only bad things happened, my husband died, my cat died, my daughter died, and I was in a near death experience. My family lost our home and our jobs for no reason. Except it was this app and trump. He shall not be president again and he should go down under and I don’t mean Canada.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
